countries.name: New Zealand
countries.description: A developed island nation in the South Pacific known for its strong agricultural exports, high human development, and stable political institutions.

countries.name: Uruguay
countries.description: A small American country with a robust social welfare system, diversified economy, and a history of political stability and institutional strength.

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.description: A European country with a highly developed economy, notable for its trade, infrastructure, and liberal social policies.

countries.name: England
countries.description: A country in the United Kingdom with a historical industrial and commercial influence, strong institutions, and significant cultural and economic impact globally.

countries.name: South Korea
countries.description: An East Asian nation known for rapid industrialization, technological innovation, and strong institutions, with global cultural influence through K-pop and cinema.

countries.name: Ireland
countries.description: An island nation in Europe recognized for its high-tech economy, strong institutions, and significant contributions to finance, pharmaceuticals, and cultural industries.

countries.name: Malaysia
countries.description: A Southeast Asian country known for its diverse economy, rapid industrial development, strategic trade position, and multi-ethnic cultural landscape.

countries.name: Thailand
countries.description: A Southeast Asian economy with strong manufacturing, tourism, and agricultural sectors, serving as a regional logistics and industrial hub.

countries.name: Indonesia
countries.description: A large archipelagic nation with abundant natural resources, a growing industrial base, and increasing geopolitical and economic relevance.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.description: A major South American economy with strong agricultural, mining, and industrial sectors, and significant influence in regional and global affairs.

countries.name: India
countries.description: A large South Asian economy with strong services, growing manufacturing capacity, technological development, and increasing geopolitical influence.

countries.name: Sweden
countries.description: A Nordic country with a highly developed economy, strong welfare institutions, advanced industrial base, and global leadership in innovation and sustainability.

countries.name: Argentina
countries.description: A South American country with a strong agricultural sector, significant natural resources, and a diversified industrial base, marked by recurring macroeconomic volatility.
